message.en_US: Hi!
Hi, Lea. I couldn't help but notice that you contacted me before the point in the story where XTM usually allows me as a party member.
Don't worry, your secret is safe with me.
Hi!
Are you managing the dungeon ok?
[nods]
Don't worry about me, I can manage well enough. Thanks for checking in.
Hi!
Umm, Lea? I'm right here. Why use Direct Link?
Hi!
Hello, Lea! Do you want me to join as a \c[3]fourth\c[0] party member?
Wow, Lea! You've already amassed a huge party. Still want me to join?
Hello, Lea! Do you want me to join your party? You didn't have to do a full Direct Link for that unless your party is already full.
[nods]
I'll be right over!
[shakes head]
Ok, just let me know if you change your mind.
Need another sword by your side? I'll be right there!
Sure, I can join for a bit.
Time to slice up some enemies together!
I'll see you later.
Until you have need of my blade once more.
Until next time!
Hang in there! I'll be back when I respawn.
They got me. I'll be back soon.
Aw, I missed my dodge! I'm out.
Um... how did I just die?
Sometimes I wonder why I choose to follow you.
Dude...\. What?
Still going? Let's finish this!
Backup has arrived again!
That didn't go too well for me.
I might need to get some better gear after what just happened.
The description says this new sword that is supposed to be more 'triangular' than my last one. Let's hope that's true.
Is that really a stat value on Triblader gear?
No, although it should be.
Such crude instruments of justice.
Whichever dev wrote that description should be fired.
Ja! I remember using that one when I was a lower level. My current sword is even more triangular.
Really? Where did you get that?
I don't even remember at this point.
I've got that one too! That's why we're the best class.
Juse bought over a dozen sandwiches. It's a good they don't spoil like in real life.
Another new sword! This one has a nicer icon than the last, it's a shame they all look the same in-game.
I just freshly stocked up on consumables, there goes all my credits!
Ugh, these enemies can be annoying sometimes.
Looks like these guys want a fight!
These guys want a fight? We'll give them one!
Ugh...
These guys look pretty tough!
Um, we might be a bit underleveled for this.
This fight might not go so well..
These enemies look extremely weak...
Don't you think we are quite overleveled for this?
Nothing like slaughtering early-game enemies.
Are you grinding for materials again? I guess I can help.
Well at least these weak enemies won't be much of a threat.
Time to put these enemies to the sword!
Let's take care of this.
More enemies? Nothing a Triblader can't handle!
I'll deal with these guys.
Here we go!
We aggroed more enemies, be careful!
Even more enemies! Hang in there!
More enemies showed up! Stay sharp!
They just keep coming, don't they?
I'll take on the new enemies.
Where do you keep finding all these guys?!
We've got some more over here!
Wow, you just keep on going! Let's do this!
...What have I gotten myself into?
Oh we're just getting started!
It seems like Lea needs to grind for item drops again.
Lea.
Try to keep up, Triblader!
Lea can get a bit..\! carried away sometimes.
Come on! Let's go all the way to max rank!
The battle only gets more heated from here!
Think you can keep up?
Is this how long you guys normally spend battling?
Lea!
Let's not let the battle get too out of control, right?
How far are we going to take this?
Mon dieu! It's getting crazy now!
Do you guys always fight this much?!
Yep!
So, umm..\. Is this going to go on forever?
You get used to it when playing with Lea.
Are we planning to stop any time soon?
We shall not rest until justice has been served!
Are you crazy? Save some enemies for the rest of the server!
Lea does this sometimes.\. You get used to it.
Now the real grind begins!\. Let's go, Lea!
Keeping up with you two is harder than you think.
Gyahahaha!\. Max rank again, Lea!
You guys fight to max rank often?
[nods]
This is really starting to get crazy now!

6_0.condition: player.entity.name == 'Schneider' || player.entity.name == 'Luke' || player.entity.name == 'triblader2' || player.entity.name == 'triblader3' || player.entity.name == 'triblader4' || player.entity.name == 'triblader5' || player.entity.name == 'triblader-lea'

message.en_US: Us three Tribladers should handle it with ease!\. This is called the Triangle Strategy, it's the best party composition!
Three Tribladers? \. You know Lea is a Spheromancer, right?
Oh that's weird, I thought her profile said her class is Triblader.\. It must be a glitch.
No kidding! How do you keep up with her?
I'm honestly not sure how I do it.
There's no way the two of us can handle all this, Lea!
Lea!
You reeeally need to grind, don't you?
We've come too far to fail now!
Lea! Are you just going to keep on going?!
I thought that would never end.
I have so many materials after that grind.\. Let's head to a shop soon.
You really like fighting, don't you?
This dull old blade can barely cut butter after all that.
If this was realistic, those enemies should be long extinct by now, sheesh.
Oh hey, look! The turtles have tridents! That's a cool weapon.
Hey you know what? Why don't Tribladers get any trident attacks? That would make perfect sense!
Yeah! With three pointy triangles on the tip!
It would have been a perfect fit for our class. Talk about a missed opportunity.
A trident would be more fitting than the Daybreak spear we currently have.
You're right! Seems like a missed opportunity.
[nods]
